trans-unit.source: Display the animated Aspire CLI welcome banner.
trans-unit.target: Display the animated Aspire CLI welcome banner.

trans-unit.source: Wait for a debugger to attach before executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 請等候偵錯工具連結後再執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Enable debug logging to the console.
trans-unit.target: 啟用控制台的偵錯記錄。

trans-unit.source: The Aspire CLI can be used to create, run, and publish Aspire-based applications.
trans-unit.target: Aspire CLI 可用來建立、執行及發佈以 Aspire 為基礎的應用程式。

trans-unit.source:
Telemetry ---------
The Aspire CLI collects usage data. It is collected by Microsoft and is used to help us improve your experience. You can opt out of telemetry by setting the ASPIRE_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your preferred shell.
Read more about Aspire CLI telemetry: https://aka.ms/aspire/cli-telemetry
trans-unit.target:
遙測 ---------
Aspire CLI 會收集使用方式資料。它由 Microsoft 收集，用於協助我們改善您的體驗。您可以使用您偏好的殼層，將 ASPIRE_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 環境變數設定為 '1' 或 'true'，以選擇退出遙測。
閱讀關於 Aspire CLI 遙測的詳細資訊: https://aka.ms/aspire/cli-telemetry

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Aspire! Learn more about Aspire at https://aspire.dev
trans-unit.target: 歡迎使用 Azure!請造訪 https://aspire.dev 以了解更多有關 Aspire 的資訊

trans-unit.source: Suppress the startup banner and telemetry notice.
trans-unit.target: 抑制啟動橫幅與遙測通知。

trans-unit.source: Wait for a debugger to attach before executing the command.
trans-unit.target: 請等候偵錯工具連結後再執行命令。

trans-unit.source: Waiting for debugger to attach to CLI process ID: {0}
trans-unit.target: 正在等候偵錯工具連結到 CLI 流程識別碼: {0}
